comments:
1.  From a Java project, export the project as jar with source included in the jar.  (Project A)
2.  I have another java project (Project B) depending on this project.  I modified the classpath from its launch config to include the exported jar instead of the project. (I removed the default classpath.  Then I added Project B back.  Then I added the jar file.)

Classpath looks like this:
* User Entries:
  * Project B
  * projectA.jar

3.  Run the debug session and step into code from Project B.  Got the exception when trying when the debug session is terminated.  

It only happened once, not sure how to reproduce it.

From Error Log:
An internal error occurred during "Initializing Quick Diff".

java.lang.IllegalStateException: zip file closed
	at java.util.zip.ZipFile.ensureOpen(ZipFile.java:550)
	at java.util.zip.ZipFile.getInputStream(ZipFile.java:335)
	at java.util.zip.ZipFile.getInputStream(ZipFile.java:321)

	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.editors.quickdiff.LastSaveReferenceProvider.readDocument(LastSaveReferenceProvider.java:252)

looks like the quick diff editor was using our editor input. Not sure how to reproduce.
Marking as works for me, unless we can find steps to reproduce.
